thread.title: ROSLYN
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by ROSLYN

author: ROSLYN
title: ROSLYN
text: I HAVE JUST EXPERIENCED THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE FROM TWO LADIES AT THE REDSPOT CAR RENTALS LATE ON A THURSDAY EVENING AT HOBART AIRPORT. I WAS LEFT TO DRY WITH ANOTHER CAR COMPANY ON ARRIVAL BUT THESE TWO LADIES WENT OUT OF THEIR WAY TO GET ME TO MY DESTINATION 2.5 HOURS AWAY. I CAN NOT THANK THEM ENOUGH. I WAS ALSO SUPPLIED WITH A FANTASTIC CAR WITH EXTREMELY LOW KM'S AND IT WAS VERY CLEAN AND TERRIFIC TO DRIVE. THANK YOU REDSPOT. I REALLY HOPE THESE TWO LADIES ARE TOLD OF HOW GRATEFUL I AM.
